cast.name: Miguel Ángel Landa Miguel Ángel Landa
María Teresa Acosta María Teresa Acosta

writer.name: José Ignacio Cabrujas José Ignacio Cabrujas
罗曼·查尔沃德 Román Chalbaud

director.name: 罗曼·查尔沃德 Román Chalbaud

introduction: 罗曼-查尔沃德是委内瑞拉写实主义电影大师，他的作品总是能反映出委内瑞拉的社会现实问题，包括毒品，犯罪等等，却也具有最纯正的委内瑞拉特色。Sacred and obscene was the 4th film from Venezuelan director Roman Chalbaud. Was premiered in 1976 and is based on the eponymous play by the same director. This was the first film produced in Venezuela with financing from the state after the critical and commercial success of When I mourn no tear (1972) and Wallerstein Mauritius Mexico's burning of Judas (1974) of the same Chalbaud.In Caracas the oil boom and the pacification of the 1970s, the former guerrilla Pedro Zamora returned to the capital and move to the pension of edicts, which becomes one more tenant. Despite appearances, Zamora came to play a revenge that is willing to carry out: to kill Diego Sanchez, the commander of the group that killed his fellow guerrillas.
